alert.note: Alert for Morgan (West Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 22 at 4:52PM EDT until June 22 at 5:30PM EDT by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 530 PM EDT FOR CENTRAL FREDERICK COUNTY IN NORTHWESTERN VIRGINIA AND SOUTH CENTRAL MORGAN COUNTIES IN THE PANHANDLE OF WEST VIRGINIA AND THE SOUTHWESTERN CITY OF WINCHESTER... At 452 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 10 miles southwest of Greenwood, moving south at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damaging winds will cause some trees and large branches to fall. This could injure those outdoors, as well as damage homes and vehicles. Roadways may become blocked by downed trees. Localized power outages are possible. Unsecured light objects may become projectiles. Locations impacted include... Winchester, Stephens City, Star Tannery, Gravel Springs, Cross Junction, High View Manor, Gainesboro, Wilde Acres, Rock Enon Springs, Gore and Whitacre. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
